name: e2ee.js
description: An extensively featured, configurable, fast, easy-to-use, zero-dependency, well-tested, WebCrypto based end-to-end encryption library for JavaScript. Works anywhere the WebCrypto API is available - Deno, Node, Cloudflare Workers and every modern browser.

scripts.build: npm run build:cjs && npm run build:esm && npm run build:browser
scripts.test: npm run test:node && npm run test:deno && rm -r dist
scripts.dry-run: npm test && npm run build && npm publish --dry-run

author: Santhanam <me@santhanam.dev>
